title: Their Lonely Betters - effect of first two lines

content.prompt: The primary effect of the first two lines ("As . . . made") in the poem as a whole is to

choices.label: imply that the speaker’s thoughts should not be taken seriously
indicate the casual and impromptu nature of the speaker’s reflections
raise the possibility that the speaker’s ideas are unusually self-indulgent
introduce an incongruity between the speaker’s perceptions and objective fact

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
